org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanproduct.domain

Class LoanProductRelatedDetail

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanproduct.domain.LoanProductRelatedDetail
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoanProductMinimumRepaymentScheduleRelatedDetail

    @Embeddable
public class LoanProductRelatedDetail
extends java.lang.Object
implements LoanProductMinimumRepaymentScheduleRelatedDetail
    LoanRepaymentScheduleDetail encapsulates all the details of a LoanProduct that are also used and persisted by a Loan.
